IdocSender
SendersEndpointSAP
Implementation of sender that sends an IDoc to SAP. N.B. The sending of the iDoc is committed right after the XA transaction is completed.
See also
Github - IdocSender Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.extensions.sap.IdocSender
Syntax
Copy
<IdocSender />
Attributes
Required

This component has no required attributes

Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
timeout	number	10000
Timeout in ms of obtaining a connection/result.
maxConnections	number	10
The maximum number of concurrent connections
maxExecuteRetries	number	1 (for repeatable messages) else 0
The maximum number of times the execution is retried
proxyHost	text	-
Proxy host
proxyPort	number	80
Proxy port
proxyAuthAlias	text	-
Alias used to obtain credentials for authentication to proxy
proxyUsername	text	-
Proxy username
proxyPassword	text	-
Proxy password
proxyRealm	tex
